work.name: Fondazione Bruno Kessler
work.summary: Intern at the Language and Dialogue Technologies (LanD) group at Fondazione Bruno Kessler, tutored by Marco Guerini. My research topic focuses on the development of Natural Language Generation (NLG) systems for countering online misinformation. During this experience, I became familiar with the summarization task, investigating various extractive and abstractive approaches. I employed pretrained Language Models for abstractive summarization, namely the Transformer models, exploring their potential and limitations (restricted input length, hallucinations, etc.).
